alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:37PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LANCASTER AND CENTRAL YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Joy to near Weigelstown. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, York, Weigelstown, Columbia, Millersville, Willow Street, Mount Joy, New Holland, East Petersburg, Shiloh, East York, Leola, Stonybrook-Wilshire, Paradise, West York, Salunga-Landisville, Maytown, Grantley, Tyler Run-Queens Gate and Strasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
